TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but NASA goes bankrupt because of it.

I wish for turtles in KSP

Granted, but they are giant snapping turtles that will eat anything that touches the water. Including Jeb.

I wish common sense actually was common.
Granted but they replace planets ruining the scienctific credibility of the game.

Granted, but since it wasn't written down, your wish is corrupted by default

I'll have what he's having

Granted, but since you didn't write down whoever's something you wanted, you are attacked by owls.

I wish people would remember to write their wishes.

Granted, but they are written in blood leading to some deaths.

I wish YouTube would stop changing it's layout.

Granted, but Youtube accidentally deletes every subscriber from every youtuber EVER. And it goes into the dark ages of 2005.

I wish I was more creative with my drawings

Granted, but you have no paper nor money

I wish I was an OP

Granted. You are now an Old Person.

I wish to (safely) visit the Moon and return.
Granted! You ride on a N1/L3 rocket and Jebediah is your pilot

I know you secretly wished for cheese. Granted, but it is poisonous.

I wish for cake that isn't a lie or poisonous, and can not hurt me in anyway, and always tastes amazing.

Try to break that.

Granted, but you weren't home to accept the delivery so your annoying neighbour got the cake and was finishing the last bite when you pulled into your driveway.

I wish a wish that wished it was a good wish. o.O

Granted, but your wish's wish was not granted.

I wish to be imprisoned in an impenetrable box for an eternity.

Good luck!

Granted, but someone else is in there and finds a way out.

I wish for a hedgehog.

Granted, its dead.

I wish for bacon.

Granted, its a bad piggy from Angry Birds

I wish SOPA never rose from the ashes

Granted. I can't argue with it.

I wish the person below me wishes that I wished a wish that was a wish in itself.

Granted, but your wish within a wish wished that my wish didn't exist.

I wish to be skilled at targeted landings.

Granted. You are undeniably the best in all of space and time at targeting landings. Unfortunately that is all you can do, once the target is set you become in a state of shock thinking about the actual landing part and crash every time.

I wish Scott Manley would release a new KSP video every single day.

Edited August 26, 2013 by Marcuzzi
Edited to keep the order correct

granted but then youtube goes down because everyone is trying to watch the videos

i wish for a hat

Edited August 26, 2013 by Zero747
forgot to add wish

Granted, but it is taken (giggity) by the wind.

I wish for zoidberg

Granted, but your game fails horribly.

I wish I wasn't such a procrastinator.

Granted, but you don't start until your dead.

I wish for me to not have to go to school.

Granted but then you cant get a god job.

I wish for a Psychic Tandem War Elephant

(Google it, its from Adventure Time)

It sits on you because I don't like Adventure Time.

I wish crumbs wouldn't get all over my iPad.
